synopsis: Rikka, Sanae, Kumin, and Shinka play word chain games around their kotatsu table.
Sanae reveals the content of her hair bun to the other girls.
A discussion on love interests leads to Sanae talking about her pet lizard (she insists that it's a dragon).
The girls talk about their favourite hot pot flavours.
The girls are at the beach, playing another word game. Rikka wants to avenge her previous loss to Shinka.
Yuuta, Kuzuha and Rikka try to figure out why Rikka's pet cat Chimera hasn't lost weight even after giving birth.
Rikka has to take English supplementary lessons in the clubroom after she fails the previous English test.
